terms.term: The Web Storage API provides a mechanism for storing and retrieving smaller, data items consisting of a name and a corresponding value. This is useful when you just need to store some simple data, like the user's name.

The IndexedDB API provides the browser with a complete database system for storing complex data. This can be used for things from complete sets of customer records to even complex data types like audio or video files.

In the context of computer programming, instrumentation refers to the measure of a product's performance, in order to diagnose errors and to write trace information.Instrumentation can be of two types: source instrumentation and binary instrumentation.

Modems also operate at the Data Link layer (Layer 2) of the OSI model. Modems also use MAC addresses to control access to the network medium. Modems are used to connect a local network (LAN) to a wide area network (WAN) such as the Internet. Modems often implement flow control mechanisms to regulate the flow of data between the local network and the wide area network.
